title: Philips Airfryer - Rapid Air Technology  for healthier frying
description:
This video explains the Rapid Air technology used in the innovative new Philips Airfrier.

Using Rapid Air technology, the Philips Airfryer circulates hot air around a metal mesh cooking basket, requiring little or no oil as it fries, bakes and grills.
Philips Airfryer with Rapid Air technology also creates less smell than conventional fryers, it is easy to clean, safe and economical for your daily use!

asset.author: Philips
asset.hookText:
This video explains the Rapid Air technology used in the innovative new Philips Airfrier.

Using Rapid Air technology, the Philips Airfryer circulates hot air around a metal mesh cooking basket, requiring little or no oil as it fries, bakes and grills.
Philips Airfryer with Rapid Air technology also creates less smell than conventional fryers, it is easy to clean, safe and economical for your daily use!

Learn more at: http://www.airfryer.com

transcripts: The Philips Airfryer uses patented Rapid Air technology to cook food crispy on the outside, tender and juicy on the inside. Circulating hot air with speed and precision, the Philips Airfryer fries, bakes, roasts, and grills food faster with perfect results. The innovative starfish design cooks food evenly, locking in the flavor by ensuring optimal heat distribution. Eat healthier without giving up the taste and texture of your favorite foods. Philips Rapid Air technology, our most delicious innovation yet.
